name: I.. Can.. SERVE.
description:
Serving soups could be boring, so just shoot them at some Karens, pretty cool, huh?

Quick Info(if you're actually reading this):

- The soup balls won't collide with the floors so you don't have to be at the same floor as the Kar-- customer and aim properly.

-  Most of the sounds are made by my mouth, and stuff I just picked up from my desk.

- I decided to only use the Comic Sans font to torture myself more.

Credits to Stuff that didn't came from my mouth:

- Bell Sound Effect

- Restaurant Ambience

- Bass Tune

Oh and uh, any comments, feedback, or criticisms are greatly appreciated. :D
